title: [Bug] New layout is bugged on mobile
body:
http://i.imgur.com/UnbpOIN.png?noredirect

1. The notice text runs off the screen. 
2. Responses don't show up. At the time of this screenshot I didn't have any notices, but I got one since then and it didn't show up

Additionally, the text when you click on your name doesn't match what you expect. "Boards Profile" has the text "Change your look", despite the page having no options to customize look.

EDIT: Looks like there are some other display issues with smaller screens (like my netbook). It loaded the top version, then the second, then the third, before settling on the fourth (which looks worse than the third).
http://i.imgur.com/XAeTnbw.png

replies.body: Hey, thanks for taking the time to leave feedback. We're working on a fix for this right now. Should have it out soon.

Another cosmetic bug (far less critical): When you click on the Blue ! it swaps the white for black, indicating it was pressed. If you then click on the smaller Blue !'s in the popup, it toggles back to white, despite the message still being down. You can then click on the main Blue ! and it'll close the message area, but toggle back to being black.

... can you tell I spent some time in QA?
yep! We're aware of this one and will be fixing it in the next deploy.

Looks like the new nav-bar also improperly handles Middle Mouse Button clicks. By default, clicking a link with the middle mouse button should open that link in a new tab. Clicking on the "News" link with the middle mouse button navigates me to that page in the same tab.

On a related note to that, clicking on a link like News then hitting your browser's back button makes the board notifications disappear.
Please fix soon, I'm having a bad time
Would you be able to tell me what system/browser you saw those display issues in? The ones in your post edit.
My name is longer than his, so on Chrome for Android  it takes just ALL the available space. There's no way I'm ever getting the notification and replies area, it has no room to appear.

The edited pictures where on Linux (specifically Lubuntu 16) and Chromium. I see the same behavior on Windows 10 with Chrome, although it steps through steps 1-3 significantly faster, still pausing at 3 before going to 4 (the Windows computer has a significantly newer processor than the Linux computer).
btw riot. made a forum app so we can check the forums more easy

I think the biggest features missing from the mobile site layout is the formatting options, *particularly* the champion/summoner spell/item icons. You can get that by toggling back to desktop mode, but it's a pain.
also they should add change server or board language button. every time i wanna see the other server i must go back to main page to change it
I just use landscape more, I don't have these problems
Notifications still don't display for me in landscape mode, even if I hide my on-screen keys to get more screen space.
On IOS 10, IPhone 5s, I can scroll to the right a little and then my screen ends up half filled with black space.
